(A) PROLOGUE
Arrived GUAM from Sixth War Patrol on 29 May 1945.
Completed an excellent two week's refit by Submarine
Division 201 and U.S.S. PROTEUS on 13 June 1945.
Lieut. Comdr. E. M. WESTBROOK, Jr., USN relieved Comdr.
J. A. ADKINS, USN as Commanding Officer. Transferred Lt (jg)
F. H. CLOUGH, USNR and Lt. J. H. WICKERT, USN; received
aboard Lt (jg) G. N. BRADLEY, Jr., USNR.
Conducted eight day training period under Comdr. E. T.
SANDS, USN, Command er Submarine Division 201, whose sugges-
tions were greatly appreciated. Fired seven exercise tor-
pedoes and conducted air-sea rescue training with aircraft.
Ready for sea 26 June 1945.
